name: Gunsun Zeros - Demo Day 20
description:
DD20 version not too different from DD18 but has new art and a lot of system reworks.

Only two base guns to pick up but they both combine with themselves and each other for five total guns. All guns now have alt-fires and some mechanic tied to the charge bar at the bottom.

Two player is available but some ui elements don't work for player two yet.
